fr.umlv.escape.front

Class DisplayableMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.front.DisplayableMonitor

  • public class DisplayableMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage all elements that can be displayed in the FrontApplication including drawing elements and launching sprite associated to them. Elements can be add or get thread safely.

      • getShip

        Return a ship associated to a body in O(1).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The ship associated to the body in parameter.

      • addBullet

        public static void addBullet(Bullet bullet)
        Add a bullet to the DisplayableMonitor. The drawing of the bullet added will be manage by the DisplayableMonitor. This method is ThreadSafe.
        Parameters:
        bullet - the bullet to add to the DisplayableMonitor.

      • deleteBullet

        public static void deleteBullet(Bullet bullet)
        Delete a bullet in the DisplayableMonitor. The drawing of the bullet will not be manage by the DisplayableMonitor anymore. This method is ThreadSafe.
        Parameters:
        bullet - the bullet to delete in the DisplayableMonitor.

      • addShip

        public static void addShip(Ship ship)
        Add a ship to the DisplayableMonitor. The drawing of the ship added will be manage by the DisplayableMonitor. This method is ThreadSafe.
        Parameters:
        ship - the ship to add to the DisplayableMonitor.

      • deleteShip

        public static void deleteShip(Ship ship)
        Delete a ship in the DisplayableMonitor. The drawing of the ship will not be manage by the DisplayableMonitor anymore. This method is ThreadSafe.
        Parameters:
        ship - the ship to delete in the DisplayableMonitor.

      • addBonus

        public static void addBonus(Bonus bonus)
        Add a bonus to the DisplayableMonitor. The drawing of the bonus added will be manage by the DisplayableMonitor. This method is ThreadSafe.
        Parameters:
        bonus - the bonus to add to the DisplayableMonitor.

      • deleteBonus

        public static void deleteBonus(Bonus bonus)
        Delete a bonus in the DisplayableMonitor. The drawing of the bonus will not be manage by the DisplayableMonitor anymore. This method is ThreadSafe.
        Parameters:
        bonus - the bonus to delete in the DisplayableMonitor.

      • deleteAllBonus

        public static void deleteAllBonus()
        Delete all bonus in DisplayableMonitor. Bonus's drawings will not be manage by the DisplayableMonitor anymore. This method is ThreadSafe.

      • deleteAllShipEnemy

        public static void deleteAllShipEnemy()
        Delete all ship enemy in DisplayableMonitor. Enemy's drawings will not be manage by the DisplayableMonitor anymore. This method is ThreadSafe.

      • deleteAllBullet

        public static void deleteAllBullet()
        Delete all bullet in DisplayableMonitor. Bullet's drawings will not be manage by the DisplayableMonitor anymore. This method is ThreadSafe.

      • drawBullets

        public static void drawBullets()
        Put in Buffer all bullets. Thread-Safe
